QuestData.Title: Sparks of Life: Thaldraszus
QuestData.Description:
Thaldraszus is thrumming with the renewed energies of the Dragon Isles.
Get out there and take advantage of it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Sparks of Life in Thaldraszus, while in War Mode.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
